snippet: A critic recalls the first stirrings of his fascination with classical music.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini recalls the recordings he listened to as a child that inspired his lifelong love of classical music.
lead_paragraph: A critic recalls the first stirrings of his fascination with classical music.

headline.seo: A Critic’s Ode to a Childhood Joy in Classical Music
headline.main: It All Started With a Toy Piano
headline.print_headline: A Boy and His Magic Ballade
